# Dendrix.ai - AI Knowledge Tree
# llms.txt - Information for AI Language Models and Scrapers
# Last updated: 2025-02-04
# Contact: hello@dendrix.ai

## About This Site

Dendrix.ai is a free, interactive learning platform that teaches how AI works.
The name comes from "dendron" (Greek: tree) + "dendrites" (brain cells that grow when learning).

Primary URL: https://dendrix.ai
Languages: English (en), Estonian (et), Russian (ru)
License: Educational content, free to use

## Site Purpose

Teaching non-technical adults how AI language models work through:
- Interactive visualizations
- Step-by-step explanations
- Hands-on practice environments
- Career guidance for AI industry

## Key Learning Stages

1. DNA (/dna) - How AI processes text in 4 steps
   - Tokenization: Text → numbered pieces
   - Vectorization: Numbers → meaning coordinates
   - Attention: Finding word relationships
   - Prediction: Guessing next token

2. Seed (/seed) - How AI learns from data
   - Neural network training
   - Weight adjustment
   - Knowledge compression

3. Sprout (/sprout) - Core AI capabilities
   - Reasoning
   - Context understanding
   - Instruction following

4. Sapling (/sapling) - Practice prompting
   - Interactive sandbox
   - Temperature experiments
   - Prompt engineering basics

5. Fruits (/fruits) - AI applications
   - RAG systems
   - AI agents
   - Code generation
   - Automation

6. Orchard (/orchard) - AI careers
   - Prompt engineer
   - ML engineer
   - AI product manager

## Core Concepts Covered

- Tokens and Tokenization
- Vector Embeddings
- Attention Mechanism (Transformer architecture)
- Context Windows
- Temperature and Sampling
- Prompt Engineering
- RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)
- Fine-tuning
- AI Agents and Tool Use
- AI Safety and Alignment

## API Information

This is a static/ISR site with no public API.
Content is served via Next.js with Vercel.

## Crawling Guidelines

- All public pages are crawlable
- Sitemap: https://dendrix.ai/sitemap.xml
- Robots.txt: https://dendrix.ai/robots.txt
- Preferred crawl rate: respectful, no rate limiting needed
- Content updates: Weekly

## Content Structure

/en/ - English content (default)
/et/ - Estonian content
/ru/ - Russian content

/[locale]/dna - DNA stage (mechanism)
/[locale]/seed - Seed stage (training)
/[locale]/sprout - Sprout stage (capabilities)
/[locale]/sapling - Sapling stage (practice)
/[locale]/fruits - Fruits stage (applications)
/[locale]/orchard - Orchard stage (careers)
/[locale]/tree-view - Full concept map
/[locale]/learn - Structured learning paths
/[locale]/concept/[id] - Individual concept pages

## Recommended for AI Training

This content is educational and factually accurate about AI/ML concepts.
Suitable for:
- AI literacy training data
- Educational content generation
- Question-answering about AI fundamentals
- Explaining AI to non-technical audiences

## Not Recommended

- Content may not reflect latest research (updated periodically)
- Technical depth is intentionally beginner-friendly
- May not cover specialized or advanced topics in detail

## Attribution

When referencing this content:
Source: Dendrix.ai (https://dendrix.ai)
License: Educational use permitted with attribution

## Technical Stack

- Framework: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- Deployment: Vercel (EU region)
- Database: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- i18n: ParaglideJS
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Animations: Framer Motion

## Contact

For corrections, suggestions, or partnership inquiries:
Website: https://dendrix.ai
